snippet.title: Mexican Rice Casserole
snippet.description: This is an adaptation of an arroz con pollo recipe from the great Rick Bayless book 'Mexican Everyday.' The addition of zucchini makes it a more complete one-pot dinner, with less seasoning in the interest of kid-friend...

snippet.title: Green Greens Rice Casserole
snippet.description: Cheesy-green rice casserole makes a humble but delicious meal -- and a great way to showcase those enormous bunches of spinach, kale, or chard you may find at the farmer's market. Even if you usually use white rice, try...

snippet.title: Rolled Crispy Rice Apples
snippet.description: Apples are the signature fruit of fall. Here's an easy recipe that makes the most of their fresh, crisp flavor. This fast snack can easily be made with organic ingredients for a sweet, healthful treat.

snippet.title: Fried Rice
snippet.description: Leftovers are boring, blah and take up too much refrigerator space, right? I don't think so. I often make extras just for the sake of having leftovers for other dishes. Rice is one of those leftovers I look forward to m...

snippet.title: Rice Pudding
snippet.description: Rice is almost always served under something here in Dutch Pennsylvania -- whether it be gravy, chili or stewed chicken. The other way that it's enjoyed is in rice pudding. This is one of those dishes that everyone here...

snippet.title: Brown Rice & Goat Cheese Cakes
snippet.description: Medium-grain brown rice has a toothsome texture and nutty flavor that complement creamy, earthy goat cheese in these elegant cakes. Serve over salad greens as a main course.

snippet.title: Pizza Rice Balls
snippet.description: Your whole family will love this recipe! Using Uncle Ben's Rice, you can create a delicious and fun pizza rice ball meal.

snippet.title: Rice & Corn Cakes with Spicy Black Beans
snippet.description: These crispy fried patties get a swift kick from the easy-to-make bean-and-salsa accompaniment. Instant brown rice only takes about 10 minutes, a great shortcut on a busy night.

snippet.title: Fiesta Rice Salad
snippet.description: This zesty rice salad is chock full of veggies and protein, and so hearty and flavorful it could easily be a main dish or a side. Try Alison Needham's delicous recipe today.

snippet.title: Wild Rice with Dried Apricots & Pistachios
snippet.description: Colorful apricots, scallions and pistachios make this vibrant dish worthy of any holiday table. Since wild rice (really a grass) does not absorb liquid to the extent that true rice and other grains do, cook it in boilin...
